comment: You can't pick a better teacher to teach HIST 2112.  Brubaker is the bomb

good teacher, I took him about a year ago and as long as you make good notes you'll do fine in his class.  He really wants you to learn though, so a few of questions in his tests will be fill-in-the-blank.

Amazing history teacher. Gives you slides at the beginning of semester that are a general outline but aren't enough to get by on. He lectures by telling history like a story and really makes it interesting. You take notes on the lectures to expand on the slide-guideline. Tests are wicked easy. 1 quiz, 2 tests, 1 final, an easy paper, and an easy A.
do not take this class he is horrible he does not give you any notes all he does is lecture his teat are very crucial our last test average was like a 57.0 seriously, not even joking!
